{{book |title=Weathertop 4 | image = Weathertop 4 cover.jpg |editor=[[Denis Bridoux]] |illustrator=[[Kay Woollard]] (art editor) |publisher=Amon Sûl Smial |date=Autumn [[1986]] |format= |pages=32 |issn=0950-3757 |followedby=[[Weathertop 5|''Weathertop'' 5]] }} '''''Weathertop'' 4''' is the third issue of the Amon Sûl Smial's journal ''[[Weathertop (journal)|Weathertop]]''. ==Contents== *Cover art by [[Kay Woollard]]
Cover central design by Debra Haigh-Hutchinson *Contents **art by Debra Haigh-Hutchinson *Editorial **art by [[Kay Woollard]] *"[[The lays of Beleriand]]", review *"Belladonna" by [[Vera Chapman|Belladonna]], Part 2 **art by [[Kay Woollard|Dora Baggins]] *"Wilmot Jumper" by Debra Haigh-Hutchinson *"Dragon", art by Debra Haigh-Hutchinson *"The Lay of Éowyn" by Valerie Sutton **art by Liz Elsegood *Book Review by [[Denis Bridoux]] **art by Dora B. *"Postie's Bane", a [[Wilmot]] cartoon, by Dora B. *"Of Falassien, daughter of Olwë" by Denis Bridoux **art by Kay Woollard, and P. 30 by Debra Haigh-Hutchinson {{title|journal}} [[Category:Weathertop (journal)]]
